title: New: Fog Notes â€“ The Diving Bell
content:
Your fingers lock pensively round her wrist, her glance catches yours then falls to the floor.

The sea rushes up to greet you both, kissing your feet with a thousand marble tongues. Skin on skin, her grip tightens, before releasing, turning up the dunes, into salt. A single, lonesome cry above the waves. Eternity before us.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
